Mr. Speaker, I will be brief.

…America. Mr. Speaker, if your hospital closes, whether you are on  Medicaid or not, you will be unable to get the treatment that you or  your family need. That is why we are fighting so hard to stop this  bill. One in four nursing homes, by some estimates, will close as a  result of the Republicans' assault on Medicaid in this one big, ugly  bill.

This bill…
